subject: Shipping to Poland
description_text:
Hello, I dont see Poland in the shipping list.

conversations.body_text: Hi kamilkok,  Customers in Poland can place orders directly through our Polish distributor, and the products will be shipped locally from Poland  https:/fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn
